value:
$WmMPID_ターナ,ch08_05_Turner_F_Normal,Face|$w0|Innes, wait!$k$p$WmMPID_ヒーニアス,ch08_03_Heanius_M_Normal,Face|$w0|Tana... What did I tell you?$k$p$WmMPID_ターナ,ch08_05_Turner_F_Normal,Face|$w0|I just want to help... I know I can!$k$p$WmMPID_ヒーニアス,ch08_03_Heanius_M_Normal,Face|$w0|Help? You'll only get in my way.$k$p$WmMPID_ターナ,ch08_05_Turner_F_Normal,Face|$w0|You don't have to be so rude. You
always treat me like a child!$k$p$WmMPID_ヒーニアス,ch08_03_Heanius_M_Normal,Face|$w0|I do not have enough time to waste it
on this conversation. Keep to the rear
during the attack...$k$pAnd stay out of my way.$k$p$WmMPID_ターナ,ch08_05_Turner_F_Normal,Face|$w0|Wait! Innes...$k$pEphraim and Eirika get along. Why
can't we?$k$p$Sbs1000|

$SbpBGM_EVENT_PLAIN_03,0|$WmMPID_ヒーニアス,ch08_03_Heanius_M_Normal,Face|$w0|We're done here, Tana. It's time to
retreat.$k$p$WmMPID_ターナ,ch08_05_Turner_F_Normal,Face|$w0|I can still fight, Innes! I want to help.$k$p$WmMPID_ヒーニアス,ch08_03_Heanius_M_Normal,Face|$w0|Tana...listen to me. I am going to say
this just once. I'll admit that you are
skilled.$k$pBut you are my sister—someone very
important to me. I can't bear to lose
you. I'm not going to chance it.$k$p$WmMPID_ターナ,ch08_05_Turner_F_Normal,Face|$w0|Innes...$k$p$WmMPID_ヒーニアス,ch08_03_Heanius_M_Normal,Face|$w0|So, please. Stop asking me for the
impossible. Now, come on. It's time
to go.$k$p$WmMPID_ターナ,ch08_05_Turner_F_Normal,Face|$w0|Yes, Innes.$k$p$Sbs150|
